Ann_Arbor.Ann Arbor station:
Ann Arbor is a train station in Ann Arbor, Michigan, United States that is served daily by Amtrak's (the national railroad passenger system) Wolverine, which runs three times daily between Chicago, Illinois and Pontiac, Michigan, via Detroit.


== Description ==
The station is located at 325 Depot Street. (Although it is in very close proximity to Broadway Street, there is no direct access to Depot Street from Broadway Street.) The station has a ticket office, is fully wheelchair accessible and has an enclosed waiting area.
